ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | 0vlid.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | 0vlid.a | |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) |
| 3 |  | 0vlid.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_lmodgrp | |- ( W e. LMod -> W e. Grp ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_grplid | |- ( ( W e. Grp /\ X e. V ) -> ( .0. .+ X ) = X ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( .0. .+ X ) = X ) |
